1.12.1.1.0.0: Major changes to spawnInfo.json layout. Please refer to pages tab of the project on CurseForge.
1.12.1.1.0.1: Fixed issues with creating summons folder on non-windows machines.
1.12.1.1.0.2: Fixed more issues with reading summons file and added more logging.
1.12.1.1.0.3: Removed some un-used code and fixed issues with loading recipes when the directory doesn't exist.
1.12.1.1.0.4: Recipe/summon files must now be UTF-8 encoded.
1.12.1.1.0.5: Fixes an issue with loading the spawninfo file.
1.12.1.1.0.6: Fixing a different issue with loading the spawninfo file and adding more logging
1.12.1.1.0.7: Fixing issue when the FTD_Summons directory doesn't exist
1.12.1.1.0.8: Fixing infinite loop when summoning monsters in Skyblock worlds
1.12.1.1.0.9: Adding configuration to allow the Altar to be broken in survival
